release.notes: * Bug fixes in sendmsg () * Added SMS_Clickatell::routecoverage function to query if a msisdn is routable via Clickatell * Refactoring to work only with PHP 5 * Work out the actual required features so clickatells updated routing engine can be less problematic

* Bug fixes in sendmsg () * Added SMS_Clickatell::routecoverage function to query if a msisdn is routable via Clickatell * Refactoring to work only with PHP 5 * Work out the actual required features so clickatells updated routing engine can be less problematic
* Check vouchers are numeric else raise a PEAR Error. * All functions requiring to post to the Clickatell API server use SMS_Clickatell::_curl
* Added function tokenpay() to spend vouchers generated on the Clickatell Website.
* Added function getmsgcharge() to get cost of message delivered via Clickatell gateway.
* Allow users to specify which queue to use. * Added deletemsg() * Allow users to specify if they want to escalate message delivery
* Changes for required features which we utilise.
* Added init() and getbalance() * Login details no longer hardcoded into script.
